properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 8 at 3:35AM EST until January 9 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3
to 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph will create areas
of blowing and drifting snow.

* WHERE...Onondaga, Madison and Cortland counties.

* WHEN...From 7 AM this morning to 1 AM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing
snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning and evening commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Numerous snow showers and squalls during
the morning and early afternoon transitions to lake effect snow
bands by late afternoon and this evening. Wind chills of 0 to 10
below are expected tonight.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 1 AM EST THURSDAY
